column5: Unique boat stolen around 29-30 November, 2018 from Blue Moon Marina north of Barrie. This is not my boat but similar.  (Mine is a blue KingFisher 2425)   1) 2018 KINGFISHER 2325 Coastal Express vessel Hull # ON5915030 (4 hours on boat) – maroon and grey in colour   2) 175HP Suzuki outboard motor attached    3) Aluminum dual axel trailer  Please contact OPP if observed, Thanks
